English Info: (Sorry,Just Google Trans.)

Drama name: " SZTV.Special.Arms.Complete.720P.HDTV.x264-CHDTV."
Formerly known as : " bullets loaded " "the last bullet left me."
Episode: 25 episodes
Type: Military inspirational themes
Director: Liu Meng
Producer: Jing
Screenwriter: Liu Meng
Production manager : High Lu Lin
Coordinator: Lanping ( Peas )

Plot:
In the late 1990s , Drama School freshman small village , in order to follow from childhood unruly rebellious recruits with a model that in order to join the brotherhood Spike training , and then brutally tired layers of " rust " selection training and, ultimately, and the old guns, hadron , Gengji Hui , Shi Generally , Deng Zhenhua , who together , became the army of hundreds of thousands every year to pick out from the six cutting-edge , composed Spike special commando special forces unit lone wolf , from a small village in uniform young artists , and gradually to touch the soldier 's soul , and gradually fell in love with the Chinese army .
He and wolf special commando team together , with the total death , in a variety of combat exercises repeatedly spectacular . During a visit border with armed reconnaissance destroy armed combat drug trafficking , in one fell swoop cleared entrenched in the southwest border of the tumor ......
The play depicts the 80 students Zhuang Yan first girlfriend in order to follow a small shadow army leave of absence to join the army , began a strangely green camp experience. He and several of his comrades experienced brutal special forces devil training to become an annual singled out from the hundreds of thousands of six elite army and special forces unit composed of Spike . Training and actual combat they really grow up , repeatedly perform outstanding service . Play a lot of stories have a real incident paragraphs prototype and strengthened dramatic conflict , which also made " I was special forces ," whether in reality or worth watching all have a huge breakthrough.
